summary.span: 類別是抽象類別 (Abstract Class)，表示 Active Directory 網域服務伺服器或 AD LDS 執行個體。

span.span: The class is an abstract class that represents an Active Directory Domain Services server or AD LDS instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CheckReplicationConsistency() cil managed

summary.span: 使用知識一致性檢查程式 (KCC) 來驗證和重新計算此伺服器的複寫拓撲。

span.span: Uses the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) to verify and recalculate the replication topology for this server.

summary.span: 釋放此物件所使用的所有 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources that are used by the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 判斷是否應該釋放 Managed 資源；

span.span: Determines if the managed resources should be released.

param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 資源，若不釋放 Managed 資源則為 。

span.span: if the managed resources are released; if the managed resources are not released.

summary.span: 釋放此物件所使用的所有 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放該物件使用的所有 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases all unmanaged resources and, optionally, all managed resources that are used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `disposing`參數會影響受管理資源的版本。The `disposing` parameter affects only the release of the managed resources. 這個方法一律會釋出 unmanaged 的資源。The unmanaged resources are always released by this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void MoveToAnotherSite(string siteName) cil managed

param.name: siteName
param.span: 在網域內要將目錄伺服器移到其中的站台名稱。

span.span: The name of the site within the domain to which to move the directory server.

summary.span: 將目錄伺服器移至樹系或組態集內的另一個站台。

span.span: Moves the directory server to another site within the forest or configuration set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此目錄伺服器是網域控制站，則這個方法會將網域控制站移樹系中的不同站台。If the directory server is a domain controller, this method will move the domain controller to a different site in the forest. 如果目錄伺服器的 AD LDS 執行個體，這個方法會移動的 AD LDS 執行個體至不同的網站組態集內。If the directory server is an AD LDS instance, this method will move the AD LDS instance to a different site in the configuration set.

exception.span: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
